title: Kale and quinoa sauté with orange tahini dressing
description: Hemsley and Hemsley’s quick and easy warm kale salad makes for a fantastic and healthy vegan meal.This meal provides 464 kcal, 19g protein, 48g carbohydrate (of which 7g sugars), 22g fat (of which 4g saturates), 7g fibre and 0.3g salt per portion.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5½oz kale, tough stalks discarded, leaves shredded, washed
1 large handful chopped fresh coriander or flatleaf parsley, to garnish
1 unwaxed orange, zest only, finely sliced
